required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Microbiome Composition Changes on 4 Week Gluten-free Diet Challenge
clinical_study.official_title: The Influence of a Short-term Gluten-free Diet on the Human Gut Microbiome

brief_summary.textblock: Changes in the gut microbiomes of healthy volunteers who followed a gluten-free diet (GFD) for four weeks were studied. Per participant, nine stool samples were collected: one at baseline, four during the GFD period, and four when they returned to their habitual diet. Microbiome profiles were determined using 16S rRNA sequencing and the samples were next processed for taxonomic and imputed functional composition. Additionally, participants kept a 3-day food diary and six gut health-related biomarkers were measured.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in gut microbiota composition upon gluten-free diet intervention
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 4 weeks gluten-free diet and 4 weeks habitual diet

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in gut associated biomarker levels: fecal calprotectin
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 4 weeks gluten-free diet and 4 weeks habitual diet

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in gut associated biomarker levels: plasma cytokines: IL-1beta
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 4 weeks gluten-free diet and 4 weeks habitual diet

arm_group.description: After instruction of a dietician, participants adhered to a gluten-free diet for 4 weeks.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- healthy participants aged >=16
Exclusion Criteria:
- Known gastrointestinal disorder
- Known food intolerance

results_reference.citation: Baranska A, Tigchelaar E, Smolinska A, Dallinga JW, Moonen EJ, Dekens JA, Wijmenga C, Zhernakova A, van Schooten FJ. Profile of volatile organic compounds in exhaled breath changes as a result of gluten-free diet. J Breath Res. 2013 Sep;7(3):037104. doi: 10.1088/1752-7155/7/3/037104. Epub 2013 Jun 18.
